scripts.pretest: node scripts/api-gen.js && yarn build && yarn amman:start
scripts.start: PROGRAM_ID=`solana-keygen pubkey target/deploy/basic_0-keypair.json` ANCHOR_WALLET=`solana config get keypair | awk '{print $3}'` node client.js
scripts.start:debug: PROGRAM_ID=`solana-keygen pubkey target/deploy/basic_0-keypair.json` ANCHOR_WALLET=`solana config get keypair | awk '{print $3}'` node --inspect-brk client.js
